name: Pogo Zero
description:
Pogo Zero is a short platformer where you play though 3 levels in which you jump automatically along a tall tower. Make precision jumps and reposition the player in mid-air to get to the top. I made every song and piece of art by myself, enjoy the game!

Press Alt + Enter to exit and enter full screen mode.

Playable with keyboard or game-controller (rumble-compatible).

Sound effects will lag behind gameplay if your hardware is using to much processing power.
